topic.title: Assessment Scale Supporting Observation - conformance rules

lines.i: An Assessment Scale Supporting observation represents the components of a scale used in an Assessment Scale Observation. The individual parts that make up the component may be a group of cognitive or functional status observations.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:16722, CONF:16723 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.86"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:16715)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:16716)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:16724)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:16720)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value (CONF:16754)
If xsi:type="CD" , MAY have a translation code to further specify the source if the instrument has an applicable code system and valueSet for the integer (CONF:14639, CONF:16755)
observation/code SHALL be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) and represents components of the scale (CONF:16738, CONF:14458, CONF:16739)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:16715)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:16716)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:16724)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:16720)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value (CONF:16754)
If xsi:type="CD" , MAY have a translation code to further specify the source if the instrument has an applicable code system and valueSet for the integer (CONF:14639, CONF:16755)
observation/code SHALL be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) and represents components of the scale (CONF:16738, CONF:14458, CONF:16739)
If xsi:type="CD" , MAY have a translation code to further specify the source if the instrument has an applicable code system and valueSet for the integer (CONF:14639, CONF:16755)
